channel.title: Aboutmes on Dr. Mowinckel's
channel.description: Recent content in Aboutmes on Dr. Mowinckel's

item.description: In short I am a cognitive neuroscientist based in Oslo, Norway, and works at the Center for Lifespan Changes in Brain and Cognition. Iâ€™m passionate about cognitive neuroscience, using R and teaching the world the wonders of R. Doing all I can to improve gender diversity in the R-community though RLadies-Oslo. Education 2012 - 2016 PhD in Cognitive Neuroscience, University of Oslo 2009 - 2011 MPhil in Cognitive Neuroscience, University of Oslo
